plot: Michael decides to expose Marta to Gob's womanizing by having her participate in a magic trick that involves one of Gob's many girlfriends.

Determined to get back in the Magician's Alliance, Gob puts on one last big show, thanks to his brother Michael. Michael, hoping to steal Marta away from Gob, tries to pull a scam almost as great as Gob's magic act. Meanwhile, Tobias, hoping to impress his daughter, becomes a "leather daddy".—halo1k
